means: 表示异议，反对( demur的现在分词 )

list.abs: what ? I am nobody and worthless ? I demur at your words , brat . the short man interrupts .什么？我不是东西？小子我反对你的说法！”矮人叫。
Carattere « 说 » - Dizionario di Sinogrammi ... 短篇小说[ short story] 二话不说[ without demur] 海说神聊[ talk at random].

then , the young princess wowed America with her demure smiles , fashion sense and well-remembered turn around the White House dance floor with John Travolta .当时，年轻的黛安娜王妃以其端庄的笑容，时尚感以及在白宫和约翰特拉沃尔塔的共舞轰动了整个美国。
I suggested putting the matter to a vote , but the chairman demurred .我建议对此事投票表决，但主席表示反对。

entry.def: If you demur, you say that you do not agree with something or will not do something that you have been asked to do.

example.ex: Hunt wanted to know, would I be prepared to take over the whole operation and supervise it? At first I demurred...
example.tran: 亨特想要知道我是否有准备接手整个行动并对其进行监督。刚开始我表示反对。

example.ex: The doctor demurred, but Piercey was insistent.
example.tran: 医生提出异议，但皮尔西却一再坚持。

entry.tran: 毫无异议地;毫不犹豫地
entry.def: If you do something without demur, you do it immediately and without making any protest.

example.ex: When Scobie opened the door and stood aside for her to enter, she did so without demur.
example.tran: 当斯科比打开门并站到一边让她进去时，她毫不犹豫地这样做了。

auth_sentence.content: In the video, Mr. Du is seen demurring as the woman recording him demands that he proclaim his love for her.
auth_sentence.res_content: In the video, Mr. Du is seen demurring as the woman recording him demands that he proclaim his love for her.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In the video, Mr. Du is seen demurring as the woman recording him demands that he proclaim his love for her.
